prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        ```json
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Air-Fryer Halloumi, Tomato & Spinach Wrap",
  "description": "Crispy halloumi, fresh greens, and a quick lemon aioli in a warm wrap. A mild, familiar solo bite made fast in the air-fryer.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "prep_steps": [
    "1. Preheat air-fryer to 200°C.",
    "2. Pat halloumi dry and slice into 1 cm strips.",
    "3. Slice tomato and thinly slice red onion.",
    "4. Mix aioli with a squeeze of lemon.",
    "5. Rinse and dry spinach."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "1. Toss halloumi with olive oil, a small pinch of salt, and black pepper.",
    "2. Air-fry halloumi in a single layer for 6–8 minutes, turning halfway, until golden.",
    "3. Warm the wrap in the air-fryer for 30–60 seconds until pliable.",
    "4. Spread lemon aioli over the wrap; layer spinach, tomato, and red onion.",
    "5. Add crispy halloumi, season lightly with salt and black pepper, then roll up and serve."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "halloumi",
      "quantity": "120 g",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "wrap",
      "quantity": "1 large"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "rinsed and dried"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomato",
      "quantity": "1 small",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "red onion",
      "quantity": "1/4 small",
      "preparation": "thinly sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "aioli",
      "quantity": "1 tbsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1 wedge",
      "preparation": "juiced for aioli"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "pinch"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "small pinch"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Egg",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
